name: minions-costs-workspace
description: Cost tracking, budgets, and financial ledgers for agent operations
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-costs/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-costs/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-costs-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-costs-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-costs-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-costs-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-costs-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-costs-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-costs/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-costs/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-costs/cli run lint
